Consumable.Name: Potion of Chronal Disruption
Consumable.Description: A swirling liquid that seems to flicker in and out of existence, distorting time around it.
Consumable.Effects: Grants an extra action for 1 turn.
Consumable.UniqueProperties: Can only be used once per battle.
Consumable.StorylineRelevance: Created by the Timekeepers, a secret sect devoted to protecting the timeline.

Consumable.Name: Elixir of Shadows
Consumable.Description: A dark potion that grants the drinker the ability to move unseen by mortal eyes.
Consumable.Effects: Makes the player invisible for 2 turns.
Consumable.UniqueProperties: Leaves a faint trail of shadow that can only be seen by the most perceptive enemies.
Consumable.StorylineRelevance: Believed to be a gift from the Nightwalker, a deity worshipped in forgotten times.

Consumable.Name: Arcane Bomb
Consumable.Description: A small orb that pulsates with contained energy, ready to unleash chaos upon detonation.
Consumable.Effects: Deals 20 damage to all enemies within range.
Consumable.UniqueProperties: Breaks magical defenses, ignoring enemy magic resist.
Consumable.StorylineRelevance: Developed by the last of the Arcanists, in a desperate bid to turn the tide of war.
